Package: org.weceem.files

[Groovy] Class WcmContentFileDB

      • org.weceem.files.WcmContentFileDB

      • WcmContentFileDB, a "file" which is stored in the data base using base64 encoding. Don't use it for large content. It is intended for logos etc.

        Authors:
        Oliver Mihatsch
